QuestData.Title: Moon Reaver
QuestData.Description:
We must not delay! If Keeper Remulos is in danger, he must be protected.
With the dreamcatcher, we should be able to enter the lair of the owlbeast Boneflux.
It must be defeated so Keeper Remulos can break free!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Boneflux and rescue Keeper Remulos in The Undergorge.
QuestData.RewardText:
My wounds are great, and my magic has been severely drained. I must recover from this enervation and return to the Dreamgrove.
The owlkin here are beyond saving by mortal hands, but perhaps Elune will one day shine her light upon them again.
Thank you, $n. May your path be blessed.
